bioHtml:
Hi! Iâ€™m Chemseddine Berbague, and welcome to my little corner of the internet. I am a developer and a data scientist. I earned my Ph.D. from the University of Badji Mokhtar-Annaba, Algeria, in 2021. My research focuses on developing new ideas and solutions to improve the performance of recommender systems, which are critical in any customization system.

I am the author of several publications in international conferences and journals, where I addressed the multi-objective recommendation quality problem by developing better collaborative filtering techniques. My current interests include improving evolutionary algorithms using deep learning and solving pressing real-world recommendation problems, particularly in health, education, and news applications.
